ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Van Helsing vs. Dracula
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Final Blessing: The terrifying tale of horror's biggest icon comes to a close! As Dracula's minions paint London red, Van Helsing enters her final conflict with the vampire that can't die. Everything is on the line, and only one will survive!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------|-----------------------------|------------------| | A | Connecting Cover A | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 1 | | B | Connecting Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 3 | | C | Cover C | Jason Cardy | 4 | | D | Cover D | Buzz & Ivan Nunes | 5 | | E | Secret Retailer Exclusive Cover | Nei Ruffino | 2 |
Note: The digital edition (3/2/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: A Final Blessing
